post:
Hey guys and girls!

Versatile IT have been providing IT solutions directly to business for the last 7 years. We decided it was time to change our business direction and we now sell virtual private servers from our nodes in Phoenix and Dallas.

All Phoenix plans include:
4 Cores (Fair share)
Gigabit port access
As many IPv6 addresses as you want! (4 by default)
SolusVM/OpenVZ
22 OS templates to choose from!
RAID10 HDD Setup
All of our plans are unmanaged.

Datacenter: PhoenixNAP

Plans:

1TB Bandwidth
1 IPv4 address
$7 Quarterly or $25 Annually
Order NOW!
